Now that I'm in Academy City, it's my turn to shine.
If you've arrived in the school city, it's my turn.
msg
We're now in the connection part of the Academic City and the bridge, the way ahead is the Gakuen Avenue, with three schools around, Senba High is in the north part.
我们现在的位置在学园都市与海湾大桥的连接处，前面这条主道路就是学园大道，周围分部着学园都市的三所学园，而千羽学园则在最北部。
今いる場所は、学園都市とベイブリッジの接続地点だ。この先の大きな道路が学園ストリート。周囲には学園都市の学校が3校点在している。そして、千羽学園は一番北にあるんだ。
지금 위치는 학원 도시와 베이브리지 연결 지점이야. 앞쪽의 큰 도로가 학원 스트리트고, 주변에 학원 도시 소속 학교 3개가 위치해. 센바 학원은 가장 북쪽에 있지.

Our current location is at the connection between Gakuen City and the Bay Bridge, and this main road in front of us is Gakuen Avenue, around which are divided the three academies of Gakuen City, while Chihaya Academy is in the far north.

Where you are now is the connection between School Street and the Bay Bridge. The large road ahead of you is School Street. There are three schools scattered around the city. And Senba School is the northernmost one.

Well...there are two ways to get to Chihaya Gakuen, one is along Gakuen Avenue through the central area of Gakuen City, which is relatively far away.
Ok, ...... there are two ways to get to Senba Academy, one is along Academy Street through the central area of the school city. It's a bit of a detour.
msg
The other one is along the coastline, no need to go through the downtown, but it's also close to the residential area, so there can have lots of Honkai creatures .
另外一条是沿着海岸线的海滨大道从学园都市外圈前往，可以不用经过城区，不过那里靠近学园都市的生活区，也就是说崩坏生物的数量可能会多不少。
もう1つは海岸線のベイストリート沿いに学園都市の外側から行く道だ。街中を通る必要はないが、学園都市の住宅エリアに近い。つまり、崩壊生物の数がかなり多いかもしれないってことだ。
또 하나는 해안선의 베이 스트리트를 따라 학원 도시의 바깥쪽에서 가는 길이야. 시내를 통과할 필요는 없지만 학원 도시의 주택 에어리어에 가까워. 즉, 붕괴 생물의 수가 상당히 많을지도 모른다는 거지.

The other is along the coastline of the seaside avenue from the outer circle of the academy city to get there without going through the city, but it is close to the living area of the academy city, which means that the number of collapsed creatures may be quite a bit more.

The other way is to go from outside the school city along Bay Street on the coastline. It doesn't have to go through the city, but it is closer to the residential areas of the school city. That means the number of decay organisms could be quite high.

You can't say that, although small spatial distortions are often encountered, but this is the first time that an area as large as Academy City has been affected.
Not really. Small areas of spatial distortion happen all the time, but never before has an entire area as large as a school city been affected.

speaker

msg

The range of distorted space is like a puzzle, the basic areas are complete, but crossing the border will lead to another part, so if we know those borders we can identify the areas in the map, and try to find the solution.
空间扭曲的范围就像一个拼图一样，有最基本的区域块是完整的，但是跨过区域块的边界就会链接到另一个被扭曲的区域块中，所以只要能找到那些区域块的边界就能大致把地图上的区域表示出来，然后尝试找出出口。
空間歪曲はジグソーパズルみたいなもの。一つひとつのピースがあって、その境目を越えると別のピースにつながってしまう。だから、その境目を探し出せれば、大まかなエリアを描くことができて出口を探せるのよ。
공간 왜곡은 직소 퍼즐 같은 거야. 하나하나의 조각이 있고, 그 경계를 넘으면 다른 조각으로 연결되어 버려. 그래서 그 경계를 찾아내면 대략적인 구역을 그릴 수 있고 출구를 찾을 수 있는 거지.

The extent of the spatial distortion is like a puzzle, there are the most basic blocks of areas that are intact, but crossing the boundaries of the area blocks will link to another distorted area block, so as long as you can find the boundaries of those area blocks you can roughly represent the area on the map and then try to find the exit.

Spatial distortion is like a jigsaw puzzle. There are individual pieces, and when you cross the boundary between them, they lead to another piece. So if you can find that boundary, you can draw a rough area and find a way out.
msg
But this has method has much randomness, it will take lots of time to find all the parts, previously Grey Moths stayed more than 1 week using this method.
但这个方法的随机性很高，要找齐所有的区域块会花费很多时间，之前用到这个方法的时候灰蛾部队在扭曲空间中足足徘徊了一个星期左右。
けど、この方法は不確定要素が多いから、全てのピースを集めるのにとても時間がかかるわ。以前この方法を使った時、灰蛾部隊は歪曲空間の中を1週間くらい彷徨い続けてるの。
하지만 이 방법은 불확정 요소가 많아서 모든 조각을 모으는 데엔 시간이 꽤 걸려. 이전에 이 방법을 썼을 땐 회색나방 부대가 왜곡 공간 안에서 일주일 정도 방황했었어.

But the randomness of this method is very high, to find all the area blocks will take a lot of time, the previous use of this method when the gray moth troops wandered in the twisted space for a full week or so.

But this method takes so long to gather all the pieces because there are so many uncertainties. When I've used this method before, the ash moth unit has been wandering around in distorted space for about a week.
